Package Users

Class Pearson

java.lang.Object
Users.Pearson
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Costumer
public class Pearson extends Object
This class create the object 'Pearson', that represent a user. It rules the actions of login and registration.
Version:
1.1.3
Author:
Danilo Basini

    costumerRegistration()

    • costumerRegistration

      public boolean costumerRegistration() throws passwordException, IOException, mailException, InterruptedException

    • verifyCredentials

      public boolean verifyCredentials​(String mail, String password) throws IOException
      Function: this method verify, thanks to the user's file, the authenticity of a user, checking the mail and the password and classifying him as a costumer or as a administrator.
